tweets.text: Taking a look through the impact statements & testimonies received yesterday from @StinkStopthe as we scan them in and send to @EnvAgencyMids and the landfill operator. It is clear that 100s of people are having their lives disrupted by the foul stink from Walleys Quarry. https://t.co/raHIxVgyvH

This is the same Brook where it is now Coldhams Brook. Right now. 

I have reported it to @EnvAgency hotline. https://t.co/sZdwbxOc6W
@bonisones2 @adseverest1 @brygoodliffe @PaulMagan2 @Agent_K1 @cambsacre @grahammoorby @NVS_Distillers @bikeitderek @martinRSPB @cllrkatie @NaturalCambs @Jane45665825 @CPRECambs @cam_friends

The coarse fish close season runs until 15th June inclusive. This means it‚Äôs illegal to fish for coarse fish in rivers.

Don‚Äôt forget, there are plenty of still waters or canal coarse fisheries where you can fish. 

Learn more: https://t.co/u6IhTpkgUB https://t.co/9Tpaa6XWIW

urls.title: Newsroom - Road closures due to fire, causing delays on local network
urls.description: Motorist are being advised to allow extra time for journeys due to a number of road closures affected by a large scale fire. Shropshire Fire and Rescue Service have urged nearby residents to keep doors and windows shut. Cooler temperatures overnight will mean the smoke cloud will drop. Highways England will monitor the motorway overnight andclose if necessary with a diversion. In addition, the M54 will be closed eastbound between junctions 7 and 5 tonight (Tues 27 April) and tomorrow (Wed 28 April)between

tweets.text: @Parrog3 @AnglianWater @NorthHertsDC @EnvAgency So to be absolutely clear. Are there people on site addressing this serious contamination issue for a rare chalk stream ? There seem to be mixed messages. It was reported over 7 hours ago. Where is the urgency to mitigate the damage and potential risks ?
@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids I don‚Äôt understand how the EA are still debating this? Our homes smell and people are ill. It‚Äôs simple, close it down#stopthestink

@WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency Has there been a point during either the tender process, or a regular audit, where evidence is submitted to prove that the connection to a reliable (and environmentally prudent) end market is there?

@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @SimonTagg I bet it doesn't make pleasant reading and let's hope the @EnvAgency take onboard the distress caused. Thank you to you and the @NewsNBC team @StinkStopthe

@martynbolt @YWDirectors @YWHelp @LizBarberYW @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency @martynbolt Hi Martyn I am sorry to hear this. If you would like to DM me these details, I will be happy to look into this for you! Thanks Ollie

#TeamEA have been out today using new equipment to fight #WasteCrime 

Waste carriers must register & operate in line with a set of rules that protect the environment and their customers

Check your site is legal & that you have the right permit ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/xROnWI1FA3 https://t.co/K3WSSkBk1r

tweets.text: @Parrog3 @NorthHertsDC @IvelRev @EnvAgency Hi Ian, we would be more than happy to provide an update on this, however we are yet to receive an exact location in order to find the work that is going on and to find an update within that. Without the location, I cannot see exactly where we are at with this. Thanks, Aaron
@NorthHertsDC @AnglianWater @IvelRev @EnvAgency Can you please update as to whether this has now been sorted?
@Parrog3 @AnglianWater @IvelRev @EnvAgency @Parrog3 Hi Ian, we are aware of the burst sewage pipe and have staff on site working to resolve the issue with the water company. Thank you.

2/2 We're following up investigations there today with the @EnvAgencyYNE & are currently cleansing & removing the substance from upstream of the outfall in order to minimise any impact. 

We're very thankful that this was reported to us so that we were able to take swift action.

Opposite side of Calder on @CanalRiverTrust land ( please contribute to Mirfield Town Council Project) and within @Naheedkirklees @KirkburtonPC areas Pollution left on trees until the next flood @YHClimateCom https://t.co/PBcIpT6AjI

Cleveland Fire Brigade, @ClevelandPolice and @EnvAgencyYNE are currently dealing with a incident on Seaton Carew Road, Billingham involving an overturned tanker. The road may be closed for some time we advise motorists to avoid the area and use alternate routes. https://t.co/jiVqZcdS38
